intro: Tiliacora mayumbensis, commonly known as the Mayumbensis Tiliacora, is a species of flowering plant in the family Malvaceae. It is native to tropical regions of Africa and is characterized by its climbing habit and heart-shaped leaves. The plant produces small, clustered flowers that are typically yellow or greenish-yellow in color. It thrives in humid, shady environments and is often found in forest understories. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and less-studied species.
